title: Developing Infrastructure Facilities of Jaffna, Sabaragamuwa, Kelaniya, Peradeniya, Buddist and Pali and Eastern Universities
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to implement the following construction projects pertaining to the above six Universities, was approved by the Cabinet:

	*	University of Jaffna 

(i)	construction of building for the Faculty of Graduate Studies.

(ii)	construction of Sports and Recreation Complex (Gymnasium).


	*	Sabaragamuwa University of Sri Lanka 

(i)	construction of Building for the Faculty of Geometrics - Stage II.


	*	University of Kelaniya

(i)	extension of the five storied building for the Faculty of Social Sciences.

(ii)	multipurpose building at the Faculty of Medicine - Stage - I.


*	University of Peradeniya

(i)	construction of the three storied building for the Department of Geology - Stage - II, Faculty of Science .


*	Buddhist and Pali University, Homagama

	(i)	construction of proposed Vice Chancellor's Quarters.



*	Eastern University of Sri  Lanka

	(i)	building complex for the Faculty of Agriculture.
